import React, { useState } from 'react' import './registercomponent.css' import Inputcomponent from './Inputcomponent/Inputcomponent' import { Co2Sharp } from '@mui/icons-material' const Registercomponent = () => { const [isOpenSpecialInputBox, setIsOpenSpcecialInputBox] = useState(false) const [inputDetail, setInputDetail] = useState({ Email: '', CollegeName: '', ITManagerName: '', ITManager: { Name: '', Phone: '' } }) WebDesign: ({ Name: 'sdf', Phone: '' }) ITQuiz: ({ Name: '', Phone: '' }) Coding: ({ Name: '', Phone: '' }) Gaming: ({ Name: '', Phone: '' }) ThemaDance: ({ Name: '', Phone: '' }) PaperPresentation: ({ Name: '', Phone: '' }) ProductLaunch: ({ Name: '', Phone: '' }) SurpriseEvent: ({ Name: '', Phone: '' }) PhotoGraphyAndVideoGraphy: ({ Name: '', Phone: '' }) const inputHandler = (e) => { setInputDetail({ ...inputDetail, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const submitHandler = () => { console.log('submit', inputDetail) } return (
Register
Email
College Name
IT Manager Name
{/*
Email
Email
*/}
Register
) } export default Registercomponent
